title: Sting (1R313)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Possession • Hand Weapon
Strength:	+2
Game Text:	Bearer must be Frodo. Fellowship or Regroup: Exert Frodo to reveal an opponent's hand. Remove (1) for each Orc revealed (limit (4)).
Lore:	”'This is Sting …. Take it, if you like.'”
Rarity:	R
Notes:	Lists: EXL, MXL
